content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md::String)::String
    # Split md string by markdown rules
    lines = split(md, "\n")
    code_blocks = Vector{Vector{Substring}}()

    for line in lines
        if startswith(line, "```julia")
            # Start of a new Julia code block
            code_lines = String[]
            push!(code_blocks, code_lines)
        elseif startswith(line, "```")
            # End of current Julia code block
            empty!(code_blocks[end])
        elseif !isempty(code_blocks) && !startswith(line, " ")
            push!(code_blocks[end], line)
        end
    end

    # Concatenate all the code blocks into a single string
    combined = join([join(lines, "\n") for lines in code_blocks]; "\n\n")

    return strip(combined)
end
```
